revised_title: Observations on Salt-Marsh Muscle, Oyster-Banks, and Fresh-Water Muscle in Pennsylvania
tldr: Dr. John Bartram describes the unique characteristics and habitats of the Salt-Marsh Muscle, Oyster-Banks, and Fresh-Water Muscle in Pennsylvania. He discusses the role of fibrous roots in the Salt-Marsh Muscle's nourishment and anchoring, the growth and reproduction of oysters, and the mobility and habitat preferences of freshwater muscles.
